content:
Hello,

I am quite new to Lean 4. I would like to create a snippet which for example automates "rcases $1 with \\< $2, $3 \\>".
The problem is that the above snippet doesn't work. Instead of the lean4 symbol \< for bracket I instead get literally \<.
Does any one know how to automate the insertion of Lean 4 special symbols?

Thank you in advance,
Omar

Edit: I found it. I will keep it in case any one wonders how to do it. One needs to use unicode symbol inside the snippet code .
For example one uses ‚ü© instead of \\>
Omar Mohsen has marked this topic as resolved.
